trans-unit.source: Encapsulates text layout information (such as alignment, orientation and tab stops) display manipulations (such as ellipsis insertion and national digit substitution) and OpenType features.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula manipulações de exibição de informações (como parar de alinhamento, orientação e guia) de layout de texto (como a inserção de reticências e substituição de dígitos nacional) e recursos OpenType.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Many common formats are provided through the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Vários formatos comuns são fornecidos por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>enumeração.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: StringFormat objects can be changed.
trans-unit.target: Objetos StringFormat podem ser alterados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial de uma instância da <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |FormatFlags|0 (no flags are set)| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | FormatFlags |&0; (nenhum sinalizador definido) | | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>|</xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object from the specified existing <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto do item existente especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object from which to initialize the new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto do qual inicializar a nova <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: format is .
trans-unit.target: formatis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> enumeração para o novo <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration and language.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> enumeração e idioma.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> enumeração para o novo <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the language of the text.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica o idioma do texto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets horizontal alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento horizontal da cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A> to specify the vertical alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>para especificar o alinhamento vertical da cadeia de caracteres.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> enumeration that specifies the horizontal alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref> enumeração que especifica o alinhamento horizontal da cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object this method creates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> cria esse método do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the language that is used when local digits are substituted for western digits.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o idioma que é usado quando os dígitos de local são substituídos dígitos ocidentais.

trans-unit.source: A National Language Support (NLS) language identifier that identifies the language that will be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador de idioma de suporte de idioma nacional (NLS) que identifica o idioma que será usado quando os dígitos de local são substituídos dígitos ocidentais.

trans-unit.source: You can pass the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID*> property of a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object as the NLS language identifier. For example, suppose you create a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object by passing the string "ar-EG" to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> constructor. If you pass the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID*> property of that <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object along with.<xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Você pode passar o <> </> *> propriedade de uma <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto como o identificador de idioma NLS.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> Por exemplo, suponha que você crie um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto passando a cadeia de caracteres "ar-por exemplo," para um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>construtor.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> Se você passar o <> </> *> propriedade deste objeto juntamente com <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.<xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"> </xref></xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: to the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.SetDigitSubstitution*> method, then Arabic-Indic digits will be substituted for western digits at display time.
trans-unit.target: para o <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.SetDigitSubstitution*>método e dígitos árabe índicos substituirá dígitos ocidentais no momento da exibição.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.SetDigitSubstitution*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the method to be used for digit substitution.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o método a ser usado para substituição de dígitos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"></xref> enumeration value that specifies how to substitute characters in a string that cannot be displayed because they are not supported by the current font.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"> </xref> valor de enumeração que especifica como caracteres de substituição em uma cadeia de caracteres que não podem ser exibidos porque eles não são suportados pela fonte atual.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados por este <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose permite que os recursos usados por este <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>objeto a ser realocada para outros fins.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto tente liberar recursos e executar outras operações de limpeza antes que ela é recuperada pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration that contains formatting information.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> enumeração que contém informações de formatação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration that contains formatting information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> enumeração que contém informações de formatação.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic default <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um padrão genérico <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for a generic default instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância padrão genérico de <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>|0| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A>|0| If you make changes to the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> object returned from the GenericDefault property, these changes persist, and future calls to the GenericDefault property reflects these changes.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>|0| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A>|0| Se você fizer alterações para o <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>objeto retornado da propriedade GenericDefault, manter essas alterações e as chamadas futuras para a propriedade GenericDefault reflete essas alterações.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic default <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O padrão genérico <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic typographic <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um genérico tipográficas <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for a generic typographic instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância tipográfica genérico de <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>|24580 (<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>, <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags> and <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>.)| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A>|0|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>|&24580; (<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>, <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>e <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>.) | | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A>|0|</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>

trans-unit.source: A generic typographic <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um genérico tipográfico <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the tab stops for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as paradas de tabulação para este <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The number of spaces between the beginning of a text line and the first tab stop.
trans-unit.target: O número de espaços entre o início de uma linha de texto e a primeira parada de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: An array of distances (in number of spaces) between tab stops.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de distâncias (em número de espaços) entre paradas de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"> </xref> objeto para este <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: In a graphical user interface, a hot key is the underlined letter in a word (usually combined with another key, such as the Alt key) that you can press on the keyboard to activate the functionality that the word represents.
trans-unit.target: Em uma interface gráfica do usuário, uma tecla de acesso é a letra sublinhada em uma palavra (geralmente combinada com outra chave, como a tecla Alt) que você pode pressionar no teclado para ativar a funcionalidade que representa a palavra.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object, the default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"> </xref> objeto para este <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> do objeto, o padrão é <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento vertical da cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A> to specify the horizontal alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>para especificar o alinhamento horizontal da cadeia de caracteres.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> enumeration that represents the vertical line alignment.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref> enumeração que representa o alinhamento da linha vertical.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the language and method to be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o idioma e o método a ser usado quando os dígitos de local são substituídos por dígitos ocidentais.

trans-unit.source: A National Language Support (NLS) language identifier that identifies the language that will be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador de idioma de suporte de idioma nacional (NLS) que identifica o idioma que será usado quando os dígitos de local são substituídos dígitos ocidentais.

trans-unit.source: You can pass the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID*> property of a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object as the NLS language identifier. For example, suppose you create a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object by passing the string "ar-EG" to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> constructor. If you pass the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID*> property of that <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object along with <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"></xref> to the SetDigitSubstitution method, then Arabic-Indic digits will be substituted for western digits at display time.
trans-unit.target: Você pode passar o <> </> *> propriedade de uma <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto como o identificador de idioma NLS.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> Por exemplo, suponha que você crie um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto passando a cadeia de caracteres "ar-por exemplo," para um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>construtor.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> Se você passar o <> </> *> propriedade que <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto juntamente com <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"> </xref> para o método SetDigitSubstitution, em seguida, dígitos árabe índicos substituirá dígitos ocidentais no momento da exibição.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: An element of the <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"></xref> enumeration that specifies how digits are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento de <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"> </xref> enumeração que especifica como os dígitos são exibidos.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> structures that represent the ranges of characters measured by a call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*> method.
trans-unit.target: Especifica uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> estruturas que representam os intervalos de caracteres é medido por uma chamada para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*>

trans-unit.source: Setting more than 32 character ranges is not allowed and will cause an <xref:System.OverflowException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Definir mais de 32 intervalos de caractere não é permitido e fará com que um <xref:System.OverflowException?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.OverflowException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> structures that specifies the ranges of characters measured by a call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*> method.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> estruturas que especifica os intervalos de caracteres é medido por uma chamada para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*>

trans-unit.source: More than 32 character ranges are set.
trans-unit.target: Mais de 32 intervalos de caracteres são definidos.

trans-unit.source: Sets tab stops for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de paradas de tabulação para este <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Each tab-stop offset in the `tabStops` array, except the first one, is relative to the previous one.
trans-unit.target: Cada deslocamento de parada de tabulação no `tabStops` matriz, exceto a primeira, é relativo ao anterior.

trans-unit.source: The first tab-stop offset is relative to the initial offset position specified by `firstTabOffset`.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro deslocamento de parada de tabulação é relativo a posição inicial de deslocamento especificada pelo `firstTabOffset`.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the initial offset position is 8 and the first tab-stop offset is 50, then the first tab stop is at position 58.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a posição de deslocamento inicial é 8 e o primeiro deslocamento de parada de tabulação é 50, em seguida, é a primeira parada de tabulação na posição 58.

trans-unit.source: If the initial offset position is zero, then the first tab-stop offset is relative to position 0, the string origin.
trans-unit.target: Se a posição de deslocamento inicial for zero, o primeiro deslocamento de parada de tabulação é em relação a posição 0, a origem da cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The number of spaces between the beginning of a line of text and the first tab stop.
trans-unit.target: O número de espaços entre o início de uma linha de texto e a primeira guia parar.

trans-unit.source: An array of distances between tab stops in the units specified by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de distâncias entre paradas de tabulação nas unidades especificadas pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Converts this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object to a human-readable string.
trans-unit.target: Converte essa <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto como uma cadeia de caracteres legível.

trans-unit.source: Only the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A> property is converted.
trans-unit.target: Somente o valor de <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>propriedade é convertida.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma representação de cadeia de caracteres deste <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.StringTrimming"></xref> enumeration for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Drawing.StringTrimming"> </xref> enumeração para este <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringTrimming"></xref> enumeration that indicates how text drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object is trimmed when it exceeds the edges of the layout rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.StringTrimming"> </xref> enumeração que indica como texto desenhado com essa <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objeto é cortado quando ele excede as bordas do retângulo de layout.
